subtitle: This is a simple soup flavoured with chilli and peppers. It is sustaining enough to serve as a complete meal.

method.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan for 2 min. Add onion and garlic and fry over a medium heat for 5 min.

Add potatoes, chopped tomatoes, green pepper and chilli sauce. Mix well and season. Cover and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 20-25 min, or until the potatoes are tender. If the soup is slightly too thick, add a little water.

title: Spicy tomato chowder
